# extract_text

This function extracts lines of text from a schedule screenshot 
```{r}
library(testthat)
library(tesseract)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(purrr)
library(glue)
library(calendar)
```



```{r examples-extract_text}
img_file <- system.file("testdata/IMG_0579.PNG", package = "ScreenShot2CalendarEndpoint")
extract_text(img_file)
```
